publicationstmt.publisher: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Collection includes: Resolution of a committee to send and publish condolences on the death of William Sample, 1 p, 4 February 1848, committee members include J. A. Hanna, W. G. March and W. R. Vincent; Letter from Isaac H. Reiter to Joseph Hanna, 1 p, 11 February 1853, informing Hanna of the selection of 25 Honorary members of the Excelsior Literary Society of Heidelberg College; Letter from James Wylie to Joseph Hanna, 8 pp, 2 February 1867, regarding church activity in Naper City, California; Transcript extract of a letter from Joseph Hanna, Los Angeles, California, 2 pp, 18 March, 1904, regarding his migration from Pennsylvania to Oregon and anecdotes on the Presbyterian Church in Oregon.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Resolution of a committee to send and publish condolences on the death of William Sample, 1 p, 4 February 1848, committee members include J. A. Hanna, W. G. March and W. R. Vincent; Letter from Isaac H. Reiter to Joseph Hanna, 1 p, 11 February 1853, informing Hanna of the selection of 25 Honorary members of the Excelsior Literary Society of Heidelberg College; Letter from James Wylie to Joseph Hanna, 8 pp, 2 February 1867, regarding church activity in Naper City, California; Transcript extract of a letter from Joseph Hanna, Los Angeles, California, 2 pp, 18 March, 1904, regarding his migration from Pennsylvania to Oregon and anecdotes on the Presbyterian Church in Oregon.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Stewart Noel, August 1974.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Joseph A. Hanna letters, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

controlaccess.subject: Protestant churches -- Missions -- California -- Naper City.
